One thing I learned from JJR at Man about Cake: for fruit flavors you can also use freeze-dried fruit powder (I get it from amazon). So far I've tried it with strawberry, raspberry and banana (though I didn't really care for the banana; they seemed too ripe for my taste). It works really well and doesn't mess with the consistency.
One tip if you do not want to make your frosting liquid use sublimated or dry fruits , use a coffee grinder or a blender , a processor to make a powder or buy a powdered version strait away .
